title: Ask Us Anything: Kristin Gives Radio Advice + Does Moe Want Kids?
description:
Our social media producer, Rebecca, asks for you to submit questions for cast members of The Bert Show to answer. We leave the door open for you to ask us absolutely anything!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
